value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's no use. There's no way out!
The darkness stretches out in
every direction!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our scouts confirm as much.
It has us completely surrounded.$k$pI don't understand... We defeated
Letizia, and she was the one causing
the darkness. Why is this happening?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|This is Embla...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|My blood screams in my veins.
I feel a turning in the depths
of my heart...$k$pLong ago, our ancestors were
bound by this blood...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|The blood of Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... A crisis of this sort and
magnitude is truly unprecedented...
Never before has something of this—$k$pIf Embla comes here, this entire land
and the people of Embla will surely
fall to ruin.$k$pIf the situation has reached this dire
point, we must beseech Lord Askr to
intervene on our behalf.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|If we call on Lord Askr... You mean
to say the Divine Dragon himself will
lend us his aid?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Yes. Or rather, so long as the
gateway has not been closed
off by this darkness...$k$pIf we are to reach the gate in time,
we must move quickly. Please, follow
me, everyone.$k$p

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|Ah-hahaha! What beautiful weather
we're having. Such lovely skies never
fail to bring a smile to my face!$k$pLady Embla is on her way. It won't
be long now...$k$pFinally, at long last, we will bring
death to Askr!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Annoying as ever... But no matter!
Lady Embla will arrive soon enough.$k$p

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Sissy... Can you hear me?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|We are going to find a way out
of this darkness.$k$pIf we all work together, we're more
likely to—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Together? With you?! What could
possibly make you think I would
go with you?$k$pI have always clawed my way to
the top—now is no different. I am
better off alone!$k$pThe mere thought of cooperating
with you is nauseating. Just...go
away, Veronica! Leave me!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...I can't force you to join us.$k$pI do hope that, someday, we can
be close again...as we once were.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I said GO!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...If we find our way out, I refuse
to leave you behind. I will be back
for you.$k$p$Sbs150|
